message:
I’ve implemented the `probing` function in `main.py` to:

- Iterate over each layer up to `tot_layer`
- Concatenate log and question hidden-state representations
- Split into train/test sets (40% test, fixed random seed)
- Train an `sklearn.linear_model.LogisticRegression` classifier
- Compute accuracy, binary F1-score, and ROC AUC
- Collect per-layer metrics into `list_acc`, `list_f1`, and `list_auc`
- Return these three lists

All changes were confined to the `probing` stub as requested. Let me know if you need any further tweaks or testing!

args.content:
I’ve implemented the `probing` function in `main.py` to:

- Iterate over each layer up to `tot_layer`
- Concatenate log and question hidden-state representations
- Split into train/test sets (40% test, fixed random seed)
- Train an `sklearn.linear_model.LogisticRegression` classifier
- Compute accuracy, binary F1-score, and ROC AUC
- Collect per-layer metrics into `list_acc`, `list_f1`, and `list_auc`
- Return these three lists

All changes were confined to the `probing` stub as requested. Let me know if you need any further tweaks or testing!
